metadata.title: Thursday, 28th September, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning whether the Government has any plans to facilitate the provision of mobile banking services in Kapoche Parliamentary Constituency, so as to provide easy access to payments from the Food Reserve Agency.
Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the Zambia National Broadcasting Corporation offices in Kabwe District will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is;
(c) who the contractor for the project is;
(d) what the contract sum for the project is; and
(e) how much money had been paid to the contractor, as of May, 2023.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a subordinate court building in Milenge District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why. ORDER OF THE DAY 1 Thanks –His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) - Resumption of Debate. ___________________________
